definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: An insect resistant maize plant produced by the method of claim 14.
sentences.chinese: 用權利要求14的方法產生的抗蟲玉米植株。

sentences.english: A tissue culture of regenerable cells produced from the plant of claim 2.
sentences.chinese: 由權利要求2的植株所產生的再生細胞的組織培養。

sentences.english: The description and the appended drawings may be used to interpret the claims.
sentences.chinese: 說明書及附圖可以用於解釋權利要求。

sentences.english: You have no right expecting more.
The formulation of claim 1wherein the emollient is glycerine.
sentences.chinese: 根據權利要求1所述的配方，其中潤滑劑爲甘油。

sentences.english: The court pronounced against my claim.
sentences.chinese: 法院駁回我的權利要求。

sentences.english: The maize plant of claim 2, wherein said plant has been detasseled.
sentences.chinese: 已被去雄的權利要求2的玉米植株。
